alert.note: Alert for Carroll (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 2:51PM EDT until July 21 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gray Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Carroll County in northern New Hampshire... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 251 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Meredith, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Conway, Ossipee, Moultonborough, Effingham, Sandwich, Tamworth, Wolfeboro, Madison, Freedom, Eaton and Tuftonboro. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
